gpgIndicator.l10n.configuration.statusRe: Background refresh interval (in seconds) for key status.
gpgIndicator.l10n.configuration.outputLo: Log level for extension log output.
gpgIndicator.l10n.configuration.enableSe: Specifies whether to use the `SecretStorage` of VSCode to store your passphrase or not. [Read more](https://github.com/wdhongtw/vscode-gpg-indicator#passphrase-cache).
gpgIndicator.l10n.configuration.statusSt: Specifies what to show about the current key in the status bar element

Show both fingerprint and user id (if any), if no user id found, show fingerprint only.

Example: `0123456789ABCDEF - Example User <example@example.com>`

Show user id, if no user id found, show fingerprint as fallback.

Example: `Example User <example@example.com>`
gpgIndicator.l10n.capabilities.untrusted: When running in restricted mode for an untrusted workspace, the extension will not read any git config from current folder.
